title:
On Motivic Zeta Functions and Stringy E-function via Embedded
  $\mathbb{Q}$-Resolution
authors: Yifan Chen, Quan Shi and Huaiqing Zuo
abstract:
We provide the formula of motivic zeta function for semi-quasihomogeneous
singularities and in dimension two, we determine the poles of zeta functions.
We also give another formula for stringy E-function using embedded
$\mathbb{Q}$-resolution, and we utilize it to calculate the stringy E-function
for semi-quasihomogeneous polynomials and non-degenerate polynomials.
